iep_goals: Maintain emotional regulation strategies during stressful situations for 90% of school day
Complete graduation requirements and transition planning activities with 85% success rate
accommodations: Access to counseling services and quiet space for breaks
Modified testing environment with reduced stimuli
learning_styles: benefits from calm, structured learning environments
responds well to positive reinforcement and encouragement

disabilities.name: generalized anxiety disorder with panic disorder

interviews.parent: Parent reports Aisha is academically capable but experiences significant anxiety about college and future planning.
interviews.teacher: Aisha produces quality work but sometimes needs extensions during anxiety flare-ups. She's interested in psychology.

observations.psychologist: Average to above-average intellectual functioning with anxiety significantly impacting academic performance and social interactions.
